name: Machupicchu by Car 03 D - 02 N
description: Machu Picchu is a 15th - century Inca situated on a mountain ridge 2,430 metres ( 7,970 ft ) above see level, It is located in the Region Cusco ,most Archeologist believe that Machu Picchu was built as an estate for the Inca emperor   Pachacutec (1438–1472).
